alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:05PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Owyhee County through 545 PM MDT... At 504 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencer Butte, or 44 miles northwest of Owyhee, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mud Flat Spring around 520 PM MDT. Big Springs Ranch and Battle Creek Ranch around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
